scripts.dev: dotenv -e .env -- concurrently --names "backend,realtime-bridge,frontend" "dotnet run --project ./backend" "npm run dev --prefix ./realtime-bridge" "npm run dev --prefix ./frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix ./frontend && npm install --prefix ./realtime-bridge
